name: Peruser
desc:
During combat, grants +10/2/2 hit/ATK/PRT for every anima/light/dark 
tome in the unit's inventory respectively (maximum of +30/6/6).
components: min(6, sum(2 for i in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, i) in ['Dark']))
min(6, sum(2 for i in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, i) in ['Light']))
min(30, sum(10 for i in unit.items if item_system.weapon_type(unit, i) in ['Anima']))
